Stem: Slender, spreading, drooping, greyish hairy. Becoming rough and yellowish grey.
Leaves: Groupings of 3 leaflets which are elongated oval shaped narrowing on both ends. Up to 4.5 cm long. Sparsely hairy underneath.
Flowers: Creamy white strongly scented with hairy supporting leaves and stalks. In clusters in the leaf forks.
FruitSeeds: Pea-like pods up to 5 cm long.
